text: Virgin Media Inc. (formerly known as ntl:Telewest, after a merger of NTL Incorporated with Telewest Global, Inc.), became in 2006 the first "quadruple- play" media company in the United Kingdom, bringing together a service consisting of television, Internet, mobile phone and fixed-line telephone services. Category:Internet service providers of the United Kingdom Category:Virgin Group Category:Companies based in New York City
title: Virgin Media
